java.lang.Object
  edu.umn.se.trap.rules.business.BusinessLogicRule
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
AddOtherExpenses, AddTransportationExpenses, AlcoholOnlyAllowedUnderNonSponsored, BaggageExpenses, DoDForeignExpenseRestriction, DoDMealRestrictions, DomesticCarRental, FamilyMemberExpensesNotAllowed, FindDestinations, ForeignGrantsNoDomesticTravel, GrantApproverName, IncidentalPerDiem, InternetOnlyUnderNonSponsoredGrants, LodgingPerDiem, MealPerDiem, NIHGrantRestrictions, NoExportGrantsOnlyForUSCitizens, OnlyOneCheckedLuggage, PerDayCarExpenses, TransportationMileageExpenses, USCarriersOnly
public abstract class BusinessLogicRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements TRAPRule

Abstract class representing a business rule. Business rules will always be run after InputValidationRules. These rules do the actual work of finding the reimbursement amount and enforcing restrictions.

Author:
andrewh
